name: Super Shooty Guy
description:
Currently only supports controller input!

So here's the story; you're a backwoods sombich and you need to get you some crates.

Still very much a work in progress and can't wait to add more awesome features!

Connect a controller and get to it! 

Move - Left analog

Jump - A Button

Reload - X Button

Right Trigger- Shoot

This game is a love letter to the wonderful arcade games created by vlambeer. If you want the most shootiest experience--check out their excellent games
